content: California life sciences software company Veeva Systems Inc has sued three rivals based in other states  claiming their use of agreements barring employees from defecting to competitors is illegal and stymies economic growth and worker mobility.
name: Veeva Systems Inc
title: Calif. software firm says out-of-state rivals' non-competes illegal
